title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Hyde St Pier
directions: at the foot of Hyde St
hours: June 21 - August 15: 9:30AM-6PM (last entry 5:30PM); August 16 - June 20: 9:30AM-5PM (last entry 4:30PM)
content: Prior to the construction of the Golden Gate Bridge and the Bay Bridge, this historic ferry-pier was the primary automobile ferry terminal that connected San Francisco with both Marin County and the East Bay.
